'''Quqing's Funds''' is a Quest Item obtained during the Event Quest ''[[Beverage Shop on the Pier]]'' during the [[Of Ballads and Brews]] event.

Upon completing ''Beverage Shop on the Pier'', the remaining quantity are converted to [[Business Earnings]].
